title: Incredibily boring.
review:
Very slow, boring, using some old horror tricks.
100% over-hyped guaranteed.

title: Overhyped Overrated Under
review:
Unnecessarily lengthened scenes, reminding me about 'Bollywood' movies.
Acting is overacted and the plot is illogical and silly.
Totally an upset find for a horror fan like me.2 stars for the good cinematography!
